content.text: The value of myBool was <%= myBool %> and the value of myInt was <%= myInt %>.
The value of myReal was <%= myReal %> and the value of myString was <%= myString %>.
pdfReport also includes 'internal' variables which can be used in the template.
For example the FileName, <%= $FileName %>.  Internal variables start with a $.  To discover all variables just call the Generate method and leave TemplateName blank
This template can be styled and formatted by following the pdfmake guide.
